mapper.insert: insert into announcement (title, content, creator_id,attachment_name, attachment_url,create_time, update_time, is_pinned) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{creatorId},#{attachmentName}, #{attachmentUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isPinned})
mapper.select: SELECT announcement.*, user.name creator_name FROM announcement LEFT JOIN user on announcement.creator_id = user.id WHERE announcement.announcement_id = #{announcementId}
